pages.page: THE ATHLETE’S HEADPHONE Music can drive you to higher levels of performance. Designed for the athlete with slim design and strong, sweat-proof materials, the wireless iSport Achieve stays fully secure, even during intese activities. • SecureFitTM SportClipTM stays in your ear • High-performance microphone for hands free calling • Durable and sweat-proof • Tangle-resistant cable Durable and Sweat-proof #MAKEITHAPPEN Follow us @MonsterProducts Monster SecureFitTM SportclipTM Also Included: x3 In Line Mic Eartips FOLLOW US @MONSTERPRODUCTS Available Colors WIRED
